actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment accorded to technologically advanced, high precision watches and watch movements.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to set forth tariff treatment and marking requirements for clocks and watches with modular movements, liquid-crystal display, or light-emitting diode display.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment accorded to technologically advanced, high precision watches and watch movements.
